cause.description:
The Progressive Pipeline links progressive activists on different campuses to each other and to the larger progressive movement, and provides those activists with resources, training, and connections.
It is aimed ot utilize the brain power we have among the youth in our progressive movement, and to create upward mobility for young people so our movement doesn't lose them.
1. Young people are smart.
cause.mission: create a pipeline between tech-savvy college activists and progressive organizations.
cause.name: Progressive Pipeline
